attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned request the Prime Minister and HM Gov to give serious consideration to the renationalisation of the British Railway Infrastructure. Time has come to end the fragmented state of British railway systems today.
This needs to be done to increase the levels of safety, restore public confidence and put to a end once and for all train operators "victorian attitudes" passengers need to be able to have through ticketing arrangments and journeys on one system.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=railways
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
